changes.old_effect: Deal 4 damage. Recover cards equal to damage dealt from your discard pile (max 3 cards).
changes.new_effect: Deal 4 damage. Recover cards equal to damage dealt from your discard pile (max 2 cards). Gain 1 Taint.
changes.reasoning: Too efficient at 3 SP for 4 damage + 3 cards recovered. Capping at 2 and adding Taint cost.

changes.old_effect: Deal 5 damage. Recover cards equal to damage dealt (max 3). Powerful lifesteal.
changes.new_effect: Deal 5 damage. Recover cards equal to damage dealt (max 2). Gain 1 Taint.
changes.reasoning: 4 SP for 5 damage + 3 cards is a net +1 card advantage. Reducing to 2 and adding Taint.

changes.old_effect: Deal 6 damage at range. Recover 4 cards from discard pile (67% lifesteal). Massive drain.
changes.new_effect: Deal 6 damage at range. Recover 3 cards from discard pile. Gain 2 Taint.
changes.reasoning: 5 SP for 6 damage + 4 cards is extremely strong. Reducing to 3 cards and adding higher Taint cost.

changes.old_effect: The first time each mission you would be reduced to 0 HP, instead set HP to 3 (recover 3 cards from discard pile). This is automatic and costs nothing.
changes.new_effect: The first time each mission you would be reduced to 0 HP, instead set HP to 2 (recover 2 cards from discard pile). This is automatic and costs nothing.
changes.reasoning: Auto-revival is already extremely powerful. Reducing from 3 HP to 2 HP.

changes.old_effect: Whenever you recover 3+ cards from discard pile (via any effect), recover +1 additional card. Amplifies large heals only.
changes.new_effect: Whenever you recover 4+ cards from discard pile (via any effect), recover +1 additional card. Amplifies massive heals only.
changes.reasoning: Triggers too frequently at 3+ cards. Many attacks naturally hit this threshold. Raising to 4+ makes it truly conditional.

changes.old_effect: Until end of turn, whenever you recover cards from discard pile, recover +1 additional card. Amplifies all lifesteal.
changes.new_effect: Your next card recovery this turn gains +1 additional card. Does not stack with other recovery bonuses.
changes.reasoning: Prevents multiplicative stacking. Changes from 'all recoveries' to 'next recovery' this turn.

changes.old_effect: Deal 3 damage to primary target and 2 damage to all adjacent enemies. Recover 1 card from discard pile per enemy damaged (max 3 cards).
changes.new_effect: Deal 3 damage to primary target and 2 damage to all adjacent enemies. Recover 1 card from discard pile per enemy damaged (max 2 cards). Gain 1 Taint if you recovered 2+ cards.
changes.reasoning: AoE lifesteal can stack too much. Capping at 2 cards and adding conditional Taint.

changes.old_effect: Deal 3 damage to target and all adjacent enemies (AoE). Recover 1 card per enemy damaged (max 3).
changes.new_effect: Deal 3 damage to target and all adjacent enemies (AoE). Recover 1 card per enemy damaged (max 2).
changes.reasoning: Consistency with other AoE lifesteal. Capping at 2 cards maximum.

changes.old_effect: Whenever you deal 5+ damage with a single attack, recover +1 additional card from discard pile. High-damage bonus only.
changes.new_effect: Whenever you deal 6+ damage with a single attack, recover +1 additional card from discard pile. Extremely high-damage bonus only.
changes.reasoning: Triggers too often (5 damage is common). Raising to 6+ makes it truly conditional. Does not stack with other bonuses.

new_mechanic_taint_penalties.description: Taint accumulation from necromantic power causes corruption penalties

thresholds.effect: No mechanical penalty, but flavor indicates strain
All damage dealt -2 (minimum 1), all SP costs +1
All damage dealt -3 (minimum 1), all SP costs +1, gain 1 Heat per turn

key_changes: Taint costs create trade-offs for power

testing_notes.step3: If WR still >55%, increase Taint penalties
testing_notes.step4: If WR drops below 45%, reduce some caps or remove Taint costs
